title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An associate may step over the line today, motivating you to address and correct the mistake. A colleague or friend might not even realize they are crossing into sensitive territory with a casual statement. The defensive Virgo Moon-Mars conjunction activates your 7th House of Others, putting you on guard against possible intrusion. Of course, its fine that you maintain healthy boundaries, but you only have to give someone a light verbal nudge rather than a hard shove to reset your interaction. Thoughtless curiosity need only be managed, not battled. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
